entry.title: Better The Devil You Know, Than The Devil You Don't...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,611Chapters: 15/50Kudos: 517

Summary: Lucifer made a deal with the Buckley's, he will save Daniel and they take in and love his son Evan as their own. When the Buckley parents don't follow through with their side of the deal, Lucifer brings Evan with him to LA. This is the story of Evan Buckley the Son of the Devil, The Prince of Hell. Note:First 2 Chapters go through his life before the 118.Chapter 3 he is with the 118.Chapter 4 is when Eddie arrives. [You don't really need to watch Lucifer, but it would be helpful, but enough context will be supplied.] This is mostly in 911 universe, with comments and references from the Lucifer universe. ğŸ«£ğŸ¤­ ğŸ˜ˆ ğŸ”ª ğŸš’ ğŸš” ğŸª½

"Hi," the man said as Eddie descended the stairs. "Iâ€™m Mark." "Eddie," he replied, shaking the manâ€™s hand. Markâ€™s grip was firm and warm. "I hope you like Italian," Mark smiled. "The rules say we have to go on the date tonight. My carâ€™s outside." entry.title: What's Needed
entry.summary:
Author: Semibold

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,723Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Buck doesnâ€™t sleep much. Itâ€™s not because he has nightmares. Itâ€™s the opposite actually. When he sleeps he doesnâ€™t see the blood dripping from Bobbyâ€™s nose or feel his raw throat coated in snot and screams. No, in fact, when he sleeps everything is perfectly fine. In his dreams, Bobby is teaching Buck cooking secrets, leading the team in saving lives, and guiding Buck through his mistakes. Buck doesnâ€™t sleep because when he finally wakes he realizes heâ€™s living the nightmare. Â  ~~ or: Buck deals with Bobby's death as healthily as you would expect. Eddie has realized his feelings for Buck and has chosen to do nothing about it. Will our two stubborn and stupid boys heal and grow together? You'll find out here! (I have to have a happy ending so yes they will) How I think season 9 could've handled Bobby's death and Buddie cannon.

Author: keroscenecure

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,453Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 16
